verses.text: On that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* did the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Ahasuerus|strong="H0325"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* the \w Jews’|strong="H3064"\w* \w enemy|strong="H6887"\w* unto \w Esther|strong="H0635"\w* the \w queen|strong="H4436"\w*. And \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*; for \w Esther|strong="H0635"\w* had \w told|strong="H5046"\w* what he \add was\add* unto her.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* took \w off|strong="H5493"\w* his \w ring|strong="H2885"\w*, which he had \w taken|strong="H5674"\w* from \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w*, and \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* it unto \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w*. And \w Esther|strong="H0635"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w* over the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w*.

¶ And \w Esther|strong="H0635"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* yet \w again|strong="H3254"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, and fell \w down|strong="H5307"\w* \w at|strong="H6440"\w* his \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*, and \w besought|strong="H2603"\w* him with \w tears|strong="H1058"\w* to put \w away|strong="H5674"\w* the \w mischief|strong="H7451"\w* of \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* the \w Agagite|strong="H0091"\w*, and his \w device|strong="H4284"\w* that he had \w devised|strong="H2803"\w* against the \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w*.\f + \fr 8.3 \ft and besought…: Heb. and she wept, and besought him\f*

Then the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* held \w out|strong="H3447"\w* the \w golden|strong="H2091"\w* \w sceptre|strong="H8275"\w* toward \w Esther|strong="H0635"\w*. So \w Esther|strong="H0635"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w*, and \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*,

And \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, If it \w please|strong="H2896"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, and if I have \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w favour|strong="H2580"\w* in his \w sight|strong="H6440"\w*, and the \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* \add seem\add* \w right|strong="H3787"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, and I \add be\add* \w pleasing|strong="H2896"\w* in his \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, let it be \w written|strong="H3789"\w* to \w reverse|strong="H7725"\w* the \w letters|strong="H5612"\w* \w devised|strong="H4284"\w* by \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hammedatha|strong="H4099"\w* the \w Agagite|strong="H0091"\w*, which he \w wrote|strong="H3789"\w* to \w destroy|strong="H0006"\w* the \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* which \add are\add* in all the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w provinces|strong="H4082"\w*:\f + \fr 8.5 \ft devised: Heb. the device\f*\f + \fr 8.5 \ft which he…: or, who wrote\f*

For \w how|strong="H0349"\w* can I \w endure|strong="H3201"\w* to \w see|strong="H7200"\w* the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* that shall \w come|strong="H4672"\w* unto my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*? or \w how|strong="H0349"\w* can I \w endure|strong="H3201"\w* to \w see|strong="H7200"\w* the \w destruction|strong="H0013"\w* of my \w kindred|strong="H4138"\w*?\f + \fr 8.6 \ft endure…: Heb. be able that I may see\f*

¶ Then the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Ahasuerus|strong="H0325"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Esther|strong="H0635"\w* the \w queen|strong="H4436"\w* and to \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w* the \w Jew|strong="H3064"\w*, Behold, I have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w Esther|strong="H0635"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w*, and him they have \w hanged|strong="H8518"\w* upon the \w gallows|strong="H6086"\w*, because he \w laid|strong="H7971"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* upon the \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w*.

\w Write|strong="H3789"\w* ye also for the \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w*, as it \w liketh|strong="H2896"\w* \w you|strong="H5869"\w*, in the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, and \w seal|strong="H2856"\w* \add it\add* with the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w ring|strong="H2885"\w*: for the \w writing|strong="H3791"\w* which is \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, and \w sealed|strong="H2856"\w* with the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w ring|strong="H2885"\w*, may no man \w reverse|strong="H7725"\w*.

Then were the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w scribes|strong="H5608"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* at that \w time|strong="H6256"\w* in the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, that \add is\add*, the \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w Sivan|strong="H5510"\w*, on the \w three|strong="H7969"\w* and \w twentieth|strong="H6242"\w* \add day\add* thereof; and it was \w written|strong="H3789"\w* according to all that \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* unto the \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w*, and to the \w lieutenants|strong="H0323"\w*, and the \w deputies|strong="H6346"\w* and \w rulers|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w provinces|strong="H4082"\w* which \add are\add* from \w India|strong="H1912"\w* unto \w Ethiopia|strong="H3568"\w*, an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w provinces|strong="H4082"\w*, unto every \w province|strong="H4082"\w* according to the \w writing|strong="H3791"\w* thereof, and unto every \w people|strong="H5971"\w* after their \w language|strong="H3956"\w*, and to the \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* according to their \w writing|strong="H3791"\w*, and according to their \w language|strong="H3956"\w*.

And he \w wrote|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Ahasuerus’|strong="H0325"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, and \w sealed|strong="H2856"\w* \add it\add* with the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w ring|strong="H2885"\w*, and \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w letters|strong="H5612"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w posts|strong="H7323"\w* on \w horseback|strong="H5483"\w*, \add and\add* \w riders|strong="H7392"\w* on \w mules|strong="H7409"\w*, \w camels|strong="H0327"\w*, \add and\add* \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w dromedaries|strong="H7424"\w*:

Wherein the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w granted|strong="H5414"\w* the \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* which \add were\add* in every \w city|strong="H5892"\w* to gather themselves \w together|strong="H6950"\w*, and to \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* for their \w life|strong="H5315"\w*, to \w destroy|strong="H8045"\w*, to \w slay|strong="H2026"\w*, and to cause to \w perish|strong="H0006"\w*, all the \w power|strong="H2428"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* and \w province|strong="H4082"\w* that would \w assault|strong="H6696"\w* them, \add both\add* little \w ones|strong="H2945"\w* and \w women|strong="H0802"\w*, and \add to take\add* the \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w* of them for a \w prey|strong="H0962"\w*,

Upon \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* in all the \w provinces|strong="H4082"\w* of \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Ahasuerus|strong="H0325"\w*, \add namely\add*, upon the \w thirteenth|strong="H7969"\w* \add day\add* of the \w twelfth|strong="H8147"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, which \add is\add* the \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w Adar|strong="H0143"\w*.

The \w copy|strong="H6572"\w* of the \w writing|strong="H3791"\w* for a \w commandment|strong="H1881"\w* to be \w given|strong="H5414"\w* in every \w province|strong="H4082"\w* \add was\add* \w published|strong="H1540"\w* unto all \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and that the \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* should be \w ready|strong="H6264"\w* against that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* to \w avenge|strong="H5358"\w* themselves on their \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*.\f + \fr 8.13 \ft published: Heb. revealed\f*

\add So\add* the \w posts|strong="H7323"\w* that \w rode|strong="H7392"\w* upon \w mules|strong="H7409"\w* \add and\add* \w camels|strong="H0327"\w* went \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, being \w hastened|strong="H0926"\w* and pressed \w on|strong="H1765"\w* by the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w commandment|strong="H1697"\w*. And the \w decree|strong="H1881"\w* was \w given|strong="H5414"\w* at \w Shushan|strong="H7800"\w* the \w palace|strong="H1002"\w*.

¶ And \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w* went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* from the \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* in \w royal|strong="H4438"\w* \w apparel|strong="H3830"\w* of \w blue|strong="H8504"\w* and \w white|strong="H2353"\w*, and with a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w crown|strong="H5850"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and with a \w garment|strong="H8509"\w* of fine \w linen|strong="H0948"\w* and \w purple|strong="H0713"\w*: and the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Shushan|strong="H7800"\w* \w rejoiced|strong="H6670"\w* and was \w glad|strong="H8056"\w*.\f + \fr 8.15 \ft blue: or, violet\f*
The \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* had \w light|strong="H0219"\w*, and \w gladness|strong="H8057"\w*, and \w joy|strong="H8342"\w*, and \w honour|strong="H3366"\w*.

And in every \w province|strong="H4082"\w*, and in every \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w whithersoever|strong="H4725"\w* the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w commandment|strong="H1697"\w* and his \w decree|strong="H1881"\w* \w came|strong="H5060"\w*, the \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* had \w joy|strong="H8057"\w* and \w gladness|strong="H8342"\w*, a \w feast|strong="H4960"\w* and a \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*. And \w many|strong="H7227"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* became \w Jews|strong="H3054"\w*; for the \w fear|strong="H6343"\w* of the \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* upon them.
